title: FARAMIR'S SACRIFICE - Fall of Mordor - Mount & Blade: Warband Mod Gameplay
description:
Fall of Mordor - Mount & Blade: Warband Gameplay - Welcome fellow Knights!  This is a new Mod for Mount and Blade: Warband called Fall of Mordor!  The developers wanted us to test out their new battle scenario and it was a huge success.  In this battle Faramir leads a few brave knights to retake the city of Osgiliath.  For the orcs to win they must kill all the Knights, and for Gondor to win they must capture the flag in the city.

Youtube Buddies: 
Lionheart - https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10

Utiplayer - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-72TRVjrj8EKBrZEg7sjFg

Mod and Battle Download: 
 http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-fall-of-mordor

www.fallofmordor.com 

Call to Arms Steam Group:
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
